p: The big bay is here at last; Alice seems to be feeling just fine, and I believe she had a good rest last night. She is not going to her lesson today - we both thought it would be foolish, and I told her that you thought she should not. So instead she is going to get a permanent; she is going to have it done by Mrs. Hoffmann this morning. Then she will come back home and get a good rest again this afternoon so that she will be in fine shape this evening.
I am really getting very excited myself about this. I trust I live over it!
Enid called yesterday, and we had a lovely chatover the phone. We may go out there for a steak roast this week end. Sigurd wants to do something like that.
This is all for now. I shall write you a good, long letter tomorrow all about the big event!
Alice feels just all right about your not being here.
stamp: UNITED STATES POSTAGE THOMAS JEFFERSON 1801-1809 3 CENTS 3
